body_html: Well it's an OpenCV problem, not ours. You can try to run your program with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=X python .... This should restrict this and all subprocesses to the listed GPUs (no need to use torch.device then. note that if you specify a single GPU, e.g. 2, it will show up as GPU 0 in the process)

body: Well it's an OpenCV problem, not ours. You can try to run your program with `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=X python ...`. This should restrict this and all subprocesses to the listed GPUs (no need to use `torch.device` then. note that if you specify a single GPU, e.g. 2, it will show up as GPU 0 in the process)
